item_category: The Acer XC-830 is the ideal home office PC, offering brilliant specs in a wonderfully compact 8 litre chassis â€“ a perfect fit anywhere, be it on your desk or underneath. The Intel Celeron CPU can handle anything you throw at it and the 1TB HDD has ample storage for documents, media and applications. The XC-830 also comes with Wi-Fi 5 built-in, offering up to 3 times faster wireless performance than before. The DVD drive allows you to play movies and music, plus the 5.1 surround sound and HDMI port mean it can handle all your multimedia needs.
